Text: Tomorrow I upload my BDRip 1080p (around 4.7 GB).

I was asked on other site why I didn't add Polish audio track, well, because it is a voice over the original track (hearing the ENG sound as well), 
not original dub made by professional actors.
I never add such crappy tracks in my torrents, they spoil the movie, use subs instead. 
Everyone can make such tracks at home, just record your own voice over the R + L + C channels lol, in Adobe Audition for instance. Cheers
